item.content:encoded:

Mon-Fri 9am-6pm[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1475488652972{margin-bottom: 60px !important;padding-top: 2.142em !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1475153944467{margin-bottom: 23px !important;}"]

Get In Touch With Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color="custom" border_width="6" accent_color="rgba(145,145,145,0.01)" css=".vc_custom_1475153884658{padding-bottom: 6px !important;background-image: url(http://8theme.com/demo/xstore/hosting/wp-content/uploads/sites/21/2016/09/line.png?id=4444) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}"][vc_column_text]

item.title: Contact Us Hosting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text website placeholder "Website URL"]

[text* your-name placeholder "Your Name"]

[email* your-email placeholder "Your address"]

[textarea your-message 5x5 placeholder "Enter your message"] [submit class:form-button "Send Message"]

* Please, let us know any particular things to check and the best time to contact you by phone

XStore demo versions "[your-subject]" [your-name] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on XStore demo versions (http://8theme.com/import/xstore/versions) import@xstore-8theme.com Reply-To: [your-email] XStore demo versions "[your-subject]" XStore demo versions Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on XStore demo versions (http://8theme.com/import/xstore/versions) [your-email] Reply-To: import@xstore-8theme.com Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.
